message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the exceptional quality, I propose a special introductory price of $15,000 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure this product at a premium rate before we adjust our pricing strategy. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you'd like to proceed with this offer.
